page.title: 02THE TOWN OF MOFFAT
page.content: {AMENITIES} Extensive tennis courts,magnificent bowling greens,wonderful 18-hole golf course,boating lake,parks and gardens are all within the town area.Angling, sailing,hill walking,pony trekking, ornothology,stately homes,castles,lead mines and many other attractions are within easy reach of Moffat.Shopping is a pleasure with a wide variety of privately owned shops offering personal service to each and every customer,and Moffat is of course the home of the world renowned Moffat Woollens.A complete range of accomodation is available in Moffat and Beattock from hotels large and small,guest houses,bed and breakfast and self catering cottages.An Art Gallery and a pottery cater for the artistic visitor. The Southern Upland Way passes close to the town.
